casebody.data:
HORACE TINDEL v. HOYT ARMSTRONG and Wife, CLARICE ARMSTRONG, SIDNEY A. STUBBS, ESTHER ANN STUBBS, FELMONT CORPORATION, a corporation, and THE OHIO OIL COMPANY, a corporation. 25 So. (2nd) 204

January Term, 1946

March 8, 1946 Division A *164James N. Daniel, for appellant. Cecil A. Rountree for Hoyt Armstrong and wife, Clarice Armstrong, and Keen & O’Kelley for Sidney A. Stubbs, Esther Ann Stubbs, Felmont Corporation, a corporation, and the Ohio Oil Company, a corporation, appellees. PER CURIAM:

This is a' companion case to the case of Tindel v. Griffin et al., this day decided and the decree in this case affirmed on authority of the opinion and judgment in the Griffin case.

So ordered.

CHAPMAN, C. J., TERRELL, BUFORD and ADAMS, JJ., concur.
